comment: She is a very good professor if you are willing to do your work. She will not baby feed anyone, but if you reach out to her and express your concern she will be willing to help.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Accessible outside class--Gives good feedback

comment: For starters, if your writing isn't great, you WILL struggle. While she is a tough grader and a stickler for formatting, she gives you plenty of time to do the assignment and her emails are always open. Attendance is mandatory but she's lenient with excuses. Plus, going to the writing center is also worth a bonus on assignments.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Tough grader

comment: She has been wonderful despite my poor choice in an early morning class for my sleep schedule. Doesn't assign obscene amounts of reading, gives great paper feedback, shows up on time every day, flawless online lectures, and overall a well-qualified professor.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures

comment: Class is mandatory but pointless since the chapter you read the night before is better than her ghetto slideshows. missing 4 classes means you drop a letter grade. She preaches about the writing center, but you'll more than likely get a bad grade if you go. If you leave before she dismisses you, she'll get angry. She needs to grow up and relax.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lecture heavy--Tough grader

comment: Amanda is one of the worst professors to breath. No joke. Her rating should honestly be lower, but i assume she reports the negative comments instead of learning from them. DO NOT TAKE HER, there are far better professors out there. She indeed gives off highschool teacher/ karen vibes! Like calm down miss i pay to be here and im an adult too.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: Professor Zubrowski was a tough grader, got a 65 on my first paper and I went to the writing center... There are quizzes in the beginning of each class about the textbook chapter reading. She is a nice and caring person but hard grader.

I took her for comp 1101 and 1102. She was amazing. I had something personal happen, and she was very sympathetic and helpful. She wanted you to pass and understand all the content. She did not like to lecture every class, so we had a lot of group activities.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Caring

comment: Good teacher, makes you work for the grade
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: English class was always been one of my favorite classes so I was expecting this class to go well, however that was not the case. The class was very hard because she is a tough grader. There's a lot of assignments due every over week and always a quiz each time you have a reading assignment. I would not recommend taking this class!

Tough grader, really really strict about tardiness, attendance and cell phone use. Probably a nice person outside the classroom but in my opinion she takes students back to high school with the over the top rules. I would've gone a much different route had I known better. Oh and the paper topics are random and off-putting to say the least

Ms. Zubrowski is a straight forward person and is willing to help you if you ask for it. If you want an A in the class, you have to work for it. There are only 4 essays and she is a tough grader. She has super easy open note reading quizzes and in-class reading responses. Don't procrastinate and put in some effort and you can easily pass.

Ms. Z was a wonderful english teacher, firm and too the point. Writing can be difficult however she always made sure the class knew exactly what she expected from us. Gained a lot of knowledge and a new passion for writing through her :)
Loveeeee her so much

She tries hard to come off mean i the beginning, but she is really actually nice. A couple of short Chapter quizzes are super easy. Papers count the most so do well on them. Participate in everything. Very strict on paper and assignment deadlines, attendance (Cannot miss more than 3 days or your final grade drops a letter) and tardiness.

Professor Zubrowski is very kind and she is very willing to help you if you email her. Class discussions everyday and sometimes a quiz on reading. You must participate in discussions at least 8 times to get full credit for participation. No phones but discussions are interesting. SUPER TOUGH GRADER; I never made above a 79 and I am a good student.

I came here looking at the ratings for my classes this term and I ran across ms.Z's profile here and I must tell you it is a pleasure to tell you all about this particular professor. By far the #1 reason I transferred to another school. For those of you who like your academic standing and are thinking about taking her class my advice to you is run.

Gives help when asked for it. Short reading assignments with easy quizzes over them. Only 4 essays and grades them tougher as the course goes on. Student-lead discussions to interact with students. Open-minded and respects every students opinions.

Gives short reading assignments and easy quizzes. Explains material clearly and will give help if asked for it. Only assigns 4 essays and grades them tougher as the course goes on. Participation definitely matters. Several student lead discussions to interact with all students.

I would definitely recommend her.  Her quizzes and discussion posts are open book.  She does a lot of in-class activities that help you understand the chapters.  You also have to participate during in-class discussions but that's an easy A.  There are four papers but the topics are pretty easy.  She also does workshop days that really help.
only have papers for grades (for the most part), very strict class expectations, treats you like a high school student

she knows what she wants out of her papers. her class is not tough but you better make sure the two of you are on the same page. I know a lot of my classmates were not on the same page with her and didnt end up doin well. I had some hiccups but I made it out with an A. Itll take a lil effort.

I was surprised I made an A in her class because it seemed as if I would make a B the entire time. I didn't know other students had a difficult time in her class because they never showed it. I'm actually glad I took her class because it was a real wake up call that life isn't always fair.

Literally took this class because of the ratings on this site.. I urge you not to make the same mistake. But if you are dumb enough to take this professor you deserve the grade you get.. My first C in years. Can't get another professor? Wait a term and thank me later. Why are the ratings so high? She reports the bad ones

Very good teacher definitely recommend! 4 papers on your choice of topic and a presentation at the end of the semester. Very strict on turning your papers in on time but is more than willing to help out. Read the articles for the discussion questions and you're good, not a hard class at all.

Avoid this teacher. She grades papers so harshly. Never made an A on a paper and I am a good writer. Made low B's and C's on every paper. Even went to the writing center and they said my paper was great, she said otherwise. I really wish I did not take her. You're better off with any other professor than zubrowski.

I wasnt crazy about the class when I signed up since its mandatory (Go figure). But it did not take long before I realized how difficult this teacher was to myself and other students (not all). I wish someone had told me before I signed up how ridiculous this class would be. Didnt learn much except to take a real professor instead of a grad student

Awful. I am pretty sure she had something out for me because she gave me a worse grade on each paper a i turned in. She treats you like you are in high school  with her rules and her talking down to you. You have a discussion in class everyday that is completely irrelevant. She doesn't further your skills at all.

Loved this class! Ms. Z makes it really easy, too. Four papers (longest paper was at least 4 pages...really easy topics too). As long as you do exactly what she asks in the rubric for a paper, you will get a good grade. About 15 short online quizzes in this class, they come directly from the textbook. All quizzes are easy 100's and open book.

I love love love love Ms.Z. She will help you with your papers before they're due and guides you through what was wrong with them. She makes class fun and worth while. Quiz due before every class, except on peer review days, taking her next semester for 1102. Love her.
Great teacher, relates with students and will help you if needed. She understands it's a GenEd class and makes things as simple as possible, definitely recommend her!

Quizzes were easy. Doesn't grade too hard. Overall she was a great teacher, she taught us what we needed to know to pass the course. She always made discussions interesting. She is a fun laid back teacher and I would definitely recommend taking her!

There is a quiz every day before class and they are super easy and pretty much word for word from the book. four papers and the first 2 she graded really hard then the last two she graded really easy. Class is a discussion about what was included in the quiz and then a review of the reading. I recommed her and I plan to take her for 1102

Fairly easy class if you attend and complete work. Five papers total, one online quiz before every class. Attendance affects grade. Class time consists of going over the chapter that you were just quizzed on, then a discussion/activity reinforcing information.
Great teacher, very helpfull and understandable. Very don to earth and willing to do anything to get you a better grade.
